name: GGJ22 - Probably Elevated
description:
This is a game I made for GGJ22 in 48 hours, using Game Maker 1.4.

The theme was "Duality" and this manifests itself in a number of ways, including, but not necessarily limited to the following:

  • 2 games in 1 (a 2D vertical shmup and a whimsical 3D simulator).
  • Starring 2 flying machines (a plane and a helicopter).
  • In the main menu, 2 mountains and 2 trees.

Links:

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/probably-elevated-7

Version history:

v10: First release (GGJ22 version).

Bugs: (in v10; to be fixed for v11)

  • 2D vertical shmup game is horribly broken (Meanwhile, you can enjoy the music I composed for it).
  • 3D simulator; wacky controls, wrong helicopter rotation, unfinished HUD, ...
  • Helicopter rotor is not rotating.
